COMMENT_TX: $Gerry Arrigo struck on right shoulder by line drive
ej,reisp101,C,wendh901,Ground rule argument Cubs Coach Pete Reiser ejected by 3B umpire Harry Wendelstedt during a ground rule argument

ej,durol101,M,barla901,Automatic ball called for spitball Cubs Manager Leo Durocher ejected by 3B umpire Al Barlick for protesting an automatic ball called on Rich Nye on the third pitch of the game; a total of six balls were called during the game on various pitchers
Al Spangler left with pulled groin muscle
ej,durol101,M,lands901,Balls and strikes Cubs Manager Leo Durocher ejected by HP umpire Stan Landes
Bill Hands left due to blister
$Lee May called for obstruction; Al Spangler awarded double and no error charged to May
Willie Smith hurt by foul ball
$Adolfo Phillips injured running into the wall
$Jim Hickman struck on right hand, left at end of inning

ej,durol101,M,pelec901,Illegal pitch by Phil Regan ej,spana101,P,craws901,Illegal pitch by Phil Regan (from bench) $with a 2-1 count, HP umpire Chris Pelekoudas warned Phil Regan about throwing an illegal pitch; Mack Jones flew out but the play was nullified due to another illegal pitch (spitter) called on Regan; Pelekoudas called for a towel and wiped the inside of Regan's cap; Cubs Manager Leo Durocher ejected by Pelekoudas; Al Spangler ejected by 3B umpire Shag Crawford and was restrained by coach Pete Reiser from the bench

ej,hundr101,P,pelec901,Illegal pitch by Phil Regan $Pete Rose struck out on a 3-2 pitch, but the play was nullified by HP umpire Chris Pelekoudas due to an illegal pitch by Phil Regan; Randy Hundley ejected by Pelekoudas, who said after the game that the umpires found Vaseline on Regan's cap
ej,rosep001,P,kiblj901,Call at 2B Pete Rose ejected by 2B umpire John Kibler
